Reviews.Title: Gets the job done!
Reviews.Author: Andrew
Reviews.Content: This Emerson isn't anything special, but it is able to work well with using it as a PC Monitor. The display quality is fine, but once again, this is just a basic monitor without many features. I have had it for over a year now it it keeps on trucking. I would recommend this to someone looking for a TV/Monitor that is cheap yet reliable.

Reviews.Title: Haha
Reviews.Author: PENTIUM218
Reviews.Content: Tv image should be better then what it is. Quite disappointed in the product that I received from the company.
